Module io.helidon.integrations.vault.auths.k8s

Package io.helidon.integrations.vault.auths.k8s

Vault authentication method for Kubernetes.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    K8sAuth
    Kubernetes authentication method API.
    K8sAuthRx
    Kubernetes authentication method API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigureK8s
    Configure k8s method request.
    ConfigureK8s.Request
    Request object.
    ConfigureK8s.Response
    Create role response.
    CreateRole
    Create role request.
    CreateRole.Request
    Request object.
    CreateRole.Response
    Create role response.
    DeleteRole
    Delete Role request.
    DeleteRole.Request
    Request object.
    DeleteRole.Response
    Delete Role response.
    K8sAuthProvider
    Java Service Loader implementation for Vault authentication method based on Kubernetes.
    K8sVaultAuth
    Vault authentication for Kubernetes (k8s).
    K8sVaultAuth.Builder
    Fluent API builder for K8sVaultAuth.
    Login
    Login request and response.
    Login.Request
    Request object.
    Login.Response
    Response object parsed from JSON returned by the RestApi.
